channel.title: Item starting
channel.description: I was wondering how to set the items you start out with when you create a new character i'm using a delta 317 source.

item.title: Item starting
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

In your client.java my sources Starter looks like this
If this did not help you PM me or ill look back on this topic later to help again

if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
		    showInterface(3559);
		    apset = true;
tradeTimer = 1200;
addItem(995, 2000000);
addSkillXP(5000, 17);
addSkillXP(14000000, 18);
}

Read full topic
